# autoAdjustmentFilters()

**Instance Method**

Returns all possible automatically selected and configured filters for adjusting the image.

## Declaration

```swift
func autoAdjustmentFilters() -> [CIFilter]
```

## Return Value

An array of [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIFilter-swift.class] instances preconfigured for correcting deficiencies in the supplied image.

## Getting Autoadjustment Filters

- **autoAdjustmentFilters(options:)**: Returns a subset of automatically selected and configured filters for adjusting the image.
- **Autoadjustment Keys**: Constants used as keys in the options dictionary for the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage/autoAdjustmentFilters(options:)] method.
